attributes.action: Stop New immigration rules for people who are already in UK
attributes.additional_details: Stop applying the new immigration rules
attributes.background: We came here with a plan that promised by UK on 5 years route we worked hard to get the ILR in 5 years, changing everything it is unfair for us, We contributed for the country,

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
